title: To the Lighthouse - Mrs. Ramsay's attitude toward

content.question: Which of the following is true of Mrs. Ramsayâ€™s attitude toward Charles Tansley throughout the passage?

choices.label: It changes from bemused tolerance to passionate longing.
It vacillates between liking and disliking.
It changes suddenly from contempt to pity.

content.answer: It vacillates between liking and disliking.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how a character's own choices, actions, and speech reveal complexities in that character, and explain the function of those complexities.
